time_markers.text: During this year of PhD coursework
quotes: During this year of PhD coursework, my four fields of specialization were theory, public finance, econometrics and international economics.

time_markers.text: At the end of my second year at MIT
quotes: At the end of my second year at MIT, I received a letter saying that I was allowed to stay in the US for a third year.
Figure 1. With my PhD advisor Eric Maskin at the 2007 Nobel concert (Eric won the prize that year).

organizations.name: MIT
quotes: At the end of my second year at MIT, I received a letter saying that I was allowed to stay in the US for a third year.
At that time, Eric Maskin initiated MIT PhD students to game theory and information theory.
